name: RACodingGapTypeCodeSystem
title: Risk Adjustment Coding Gap Type Code System
description: This is a draft code system for coding gap type.

concept.definition: Request to close the risk adjustment coding gap.

concept.display: Coding gap invalidated, patient never had the condition
concept.definition: Patient was incorrectly diagnosed and has never had this condition, hence an invalidation request for the risk adjustment coding gap.

concept.display: Coding gap invalidated, condition no longer active
concept.definition: Patient was correctly diagnosed but the condition is no longer active, hence an invalidation request for the risk adjustment coding gap.
Patient has an active condition but the gap does not accurately describe it, hence an invalidation request for the risk adjustment coding gap.
Providers or certified risk adjustment coders to create and close a new net-new gap discovered during medical review.
Original coding gaps generated by payers using their data and suspecting algorithms.
